name: modern-frontend-development-workflow
description: This is a modern frontend development workflow that compiles ES6 and ES7 down to ES5. It uses webpack and babel to transpile and bundle the code. It includes dev dependencies such as @babel/core, @babel/polyfill, @babel/preset-env, @babel/preset-stage-0, babel-loader, css-loader, html-webpack-plugin, style-loader, webpack, webpack-cli, and webpack-dev-server. The build script runs webpack to bundle the code, and the start script runs webpack-dev-server and opens the project in a browser. The workflow is licensed under the MIT license.
author: Levi Omagbemi
